entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bella Bella
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:56 AM PST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bella Bella Airport 05:00 AM PST Saturday 11 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -2.4°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 88 %
Dewpoint: -4.1°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this morning. A few rain showers and flurries beginning near noon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 except northeast 50 gusting to 70 through mainland inlets and valleys. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few rain showers and flurries changing to periods of snow mixed with rain this evening. Local snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 except northeast 50 gusting to 70 through mainland inlets and valleys. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 11 March 2023
